entry.title: Calisthenics Anti-Slip Tech-Touch Fitness Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Workout Wear
Price: 14.95

● Designed, based & serviced in California
● Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide/ Self Sanitizing
● Slip Proof Design
● Tech-Touch Fingertips
● Odor-Proof Technology
● Reflective Strip

Get extra grip with a pair of Anti-Slip Fitness Gloves featuring Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide protection. The treated fabric repels germs and bacteria from your hands allowing you to wipe away sweat or grip unsanitized gear while remaining fresh. Anti-slip panels throughout the palms offer extra grip while running, hiking, biking, strength training, calisthenic workouts, practicing cardio, performing gravity-defying exercises and more. Slip the glove onto your wrist and secure the fit with a heavy-duty self-fastening strap. The index finger and thumb tips are touch screen smartphone-sensitive to keep you connected.

Made in Taiwan

Materials: Microfiber, Ottoman, Neoprene

Care: Hand wash cold. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron.

Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer Guarantee

entry.title: Padded Weight Lifting Tech-Touch Workout Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Workout Wear
Price: 15.95

● Designed, based & serviced in California
● Antimicrobial/ Self Sanitizing
● Tech-Touch Fingertips
● Callus Padding Protection
● Odor-Proof Technology
● Wrist Pull Tab

Antimicrobial Tech-Touch Padded Weight Lifting Workout Gloves offer extra-grip and a full-finger design with plush padding to keep your hands intact from calluses and abrasions. Made with ventilated antimicrobial fabric to repel germs and bacteria from sweat and dirty gym equipment while maintaining a fresh scent. Easy to adjust, slip and off with self fastening wrist strap and pull. Stay connected between sets with smartphone-sensitive touch screen tips on the index finger and thumb.

Made in Taiwan

Materials: Lycra, Microfiber, SBR, Polyester, Ottoman

Care: Machine wash cold. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron.

Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer Guarantee

Price: 30.00

● 100% Latex-Free
● Made from Natural Rubber
● 10 to 140 LBS Tensity
● Reusable Velcro Strap
● Light to High Intensity
● Available in Singles & Sets

Power Resistance Bands use high strength and rapid rebound to intensify your workouts. NZG uses an exclusive manufacturing method to provide 100% latex-free natural rubber bands derived from tree sap. The tensile resistance is broken down into seven color-coded levels varying in weight and width. Get a versatile workout range with this easy-to-use fitness accessory that targets your back, arms, glutes and legs. A compact and portable design ideal for tossing in your gym bag or as part of your home-gym setup! Available to order individually or in pairs.

Care: Clean with a damp towel and air dry.

Thickness: 0.16-inches

entry.title: PowerDyne Dumbbell Stand
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Training Equipment
Price: 140.00

  • Holds 2 PowerDyne Dumbbells
  • Steel Hardware & Base
  • Height: 24.2-inches
  • Heavy-Duty Brake Locks
  • Swivel Caster Wheels

Take your home gym setup to the next level with the PowerDyne Stand compatible with all versions of PowerDyne Adjustable Dumbbells. The base is made with heavy-duty steel and holds two (2) PowerDyne Dumbbells at a time. Transport your set from one place to another with four (4) swivel caster wheels made of nylon with steel brake locks. Place the stand on a smooth surface and lock it securely in place before use.

Material: Steel, Nylon

Dimensions: 27.56x 22.64x24.2-inches (LxWxH). Tray Dimension measures: 16.25" L x 7.85" W.

entry.title: PURiGUARD Balaclava
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Headgear
Price: 22.00

● Designed, based & serviced in California
● Antibacterial PURiGUARD® Technology
● Anti-chafe Liner
● 4-Way Stretch
● UPF 50+

Get antibacterial protection while wrapped in a classic Balaclava next time you’re out on a motorcycle, hunting or skiing. PURiGUARD® technology protects and keeps you fresh using odorless and non-toxic Zinc Oxide for an antibacterial finish. Designed to be worn alone or layered under a helmet while absorbing sweat and keeping your eyesight free of excess moisture. A necessary sports gear addition to your next hunting trip or to be worn with ski goggles; the 4-way stretch allows you to mold the shape to fit your needs. Plus, get 50+ UPF sun protection and ride into the sunset free of sun and wind burn.

Materials: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

Care: Machine wash cold. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron.

Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer Guarantee

Based in California. Made in Taiwan.

entry.title: PURiGUARD Neck Gaiter
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Headgear
Price: 14.00

  • PURiGUARD Technology
  • Antibacterial Finish
  • Multi-Use Design
  • 4-Way Stretch
  • UPF 50+

 

The PURiGUARD Neck Gaiter is a multifunctional form-fitting cover with antibacterial protection. PURiGUARD technology uses odorless and non-toxic Zinc Oxide to provide an antibacterial fabric finish while reducing 60% of chemical and 41% of carbon emission during the manufacturing process. Lightweight, breathable material stretches in all four directions for a snug fit that can easily slide on and off. The flat-lock stitching lays smooth against your skin to prevent chafing. Follow the action indoor or outdoors with UPF 50+ sun protection.

Material: 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex

Care: Machine wash cold. Air dry. Do not iron.

entry.title: PowerDyne Adjustable 55lbs Dumbbell (Pair)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Training Equipment
Price: 369.95

● Free Standard Shipping!
● 10 to 110lbs (55lbs each)
● 20 Iron Weight Plates
● No-Slip Grip
● Compact Design
● Ships in 4 Packages

Tone and sculpt specific muscle groups while increasing strength with the PowerDyne 55lbs Adjustable Dumbbell. Ten (10) adjustable iron weight plates increment from 5lbs up to 55lbs to match your training intensity. To adjust the dumbbell weight, unlock, align to the desired weight, and secure back into place. Safely and securely lift weights with no-slip grip handles. The compact design measures 9.25x15.5x3.75-inches in a sturdy and secure storage tray with lifting handles. The perfect addition to your home gym!


Weight Increments: 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 15, 18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 33, 37, 42, 46, 51 to 55 lbs.
Materials: Iron, Aluminum, Glass Fiber Filled Nylon, Polycarbonate & Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene Plastic.
Care: Avoid moisture and use in a dry environment.
Shipping: The product will ship in 4 separate packages.

entry.title: SeaTex Eco Polygiene Performance Mask (Stripes)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.95

  • Antibacterial Treatment 
  • Sustainable SeaWool 
  • Odor-Block & Quick Dry
  • Heat Retention
  • UV 50+ 

The SeaTex Eco Performance Mask offers maximum protection with sustainable production. Made with 2 layers of SeaWool, 100% recycled PET water bottles and oyster shells, spun into Polyester. SeaWool is anti-static and offers UV+ 50 with a superior warmth-to-weight ratio. The layers are treated with Polygiene®, an eco-friendly antibacterial finish using Silver Salt (Silver Chloride) to prevent the growth of odor-causing microbes. Train at ease with the lightweight design, pliable nose guard, adjustable straps and Polygiene® storage bag.

Care: Machine wash cold and air dry. 

Materials: 100% Recycled Polyester with an Antibacterial Polygiene® Treatment. 

Size: Regular: (6.5" Length, 9” Width) & Small: (5.75" Length, 8.25" Width)

entry.title: SilTex Polygiene Performance Mask (Black Camo)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.95

  • 2-Ply Design 
  • Cooling Technology
  • Antibacterial Odor-Block
  • Quick Dry
  • UV 50+ 

Maximize your comfort and protection with the antibacterial SilTex Performance Mask, constructed with 2 layers of fabric. The layers are treated with Polygiene®, a sustainable antibacterial finish using Silver Salt (Silver chloride) that prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes: bacteria, fungus and mildew. The inner layer, made with a 76% Nylon + 24% Polyester blend, provides a cool to the touch effect. Train at ease with the lightweight design, pliable nose guard, adjustable straps and Polygiene® storage bag. 

Care: Machine wash cold and air dry.

Size: Available in two sizes: Regular: (6.5" Length, 9” Width) & Small: (5.75" Length, 8.25" Width)

● Free Standard Shipping!
● Lift Up to 160lbs (80lbs each)

● Compact Design No-Slip Grip

The PowerDyne Adjustable Dumbbell Set includes 2 dumbbells: the essential heavy-duty weight equipment to sculpt and tone muscles throughout the body. Increase your strength with 2 sets of 10 adjustable iron weight plates that increment from 5lbs up to 80lbs each. Securely lift a total of 160lbs with no-slip grip handles. To increase the dumbbell weight, unlock, adjust the pin boxes, align to the desired weight, then secure back into place. The compact design features 2 sturdy and secure 18x9x9inch storage trays.
